SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.config.assertion

Class AssertConfig

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.config.ConfigFoundation
com.mimecast.robin.config.assertion.AssertConfig
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class AssertConfig extends ConfigFoundation
Assertions container.

SMTP assertions may be present at both session and envelope level.
They are done directly over the SMTP transactions.

External assertions require a client for fetching the logs.

See Also:
  • ExternalClient
